comments:
Version: PDE 205; UI latest as of 11/05/01

Description: 
Looks like there is a problem with the initPage() and either removePage() or 
updateActionBars() code of PageBookView after releasing the changes for the 
Outline/Propertysheet menu registration work.

Steps:
Open PDE perspective 
Create a file called plugin.xml 
BUG: First 2 exceptions happen
Close PDE perspective
BUG: Third exception happens

PDEMultiPagePropertySheet is implementing IPropertySheetPage but not extending
Page (IPage indicates that it not intented to be implemented, clients must 
subclass Page).
The JavaOutlinePage for example does this correctly by declaring
class JavaOutlinePage extends Page implements IContentOutlinePage.
Modified workbench code.
Implementors of IContentOutlinePage and IPropertySheetPage which do not 
subclass Page will continue to work. They will need to implement 
IPageBookViewPage if they want to take advantage of new API to receive an 
IPageSite. This site allows the registration of a context menu.
